name: Ratatouille Pie
description: Say “oui” to this hearty, French comfort food. It’s great for cozying up during the colder months. The flavours of ratatouille pie pay homage to the French countryside, with aromatic herbs, onion, and garlic. This pie is vegetarian but high in protein from nutrient- and fibre-rich lentils.

ingredients.name: Ratatouille Seasoning or Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning

preparation: Dice eggplant, pepper, and zucchini. Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium heat. Stir in diced veggies, seasoning, and diced tomatoes. Cover and simmer 12 min, or until vegetables are tender, stirring halfway.
Meanwhile, use a fork to poke holes in the pie shell. Bake 10 min.
To assemble pie, cover bottom of shell with lentils and top with 3 cups prepared ratatouille. Crumble on ricotta mixture and sprinkle with mozzarella.
Bake 20 min, or until cheese is bubbly.
tips: Save some time by preparing the ratatouille and par-baking the pie shell the night before.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: This is a perfectly balanced plate.

products.name: Chicken Souvlaki Seasoning (Pkg of 3)
summary: A Greek-inspired meal, souvlaki is marinated meat grilled on a skewer, often served with warm pita bread and tzatziki. No grill? No problem. Skip the skewers and put your Sheet Pan to work to make equally tasty Chicken Souvlaki in 20 minutes in the oven.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.
